item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "Being charming is my hobby." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "You can have it all. Just not all at once." -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "My mother wasnʹt sleeping with anybody. She doesnʹt even sleep with my father." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Winston Churchhill
item.description: "We make a living by what we get. We make a life by what we give." -- Winston Churchhill

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "Look, Rose. You don't have to keep up with the hard-to-get thing. You already got me." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by John Updike
item.description: "Dreams come true. Without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them. " -- John Updike

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "I find prostitutes vastly important." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Oprah Winfrey
item.description: "I've come to believe that each of us has a personal calling that's as unique as a fingerprint - and that the best way to succeed is to discover what you love and then find a way to offer it to others in the form of service, working hard, and also allowing the energy of the universe to lead you. " -- Oprah Winfrey

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "Hey, a guy can hope. I mean, it’s not impossible that a car full of scantily clad sorority girls might break down outside and need my help.” “That’s true,” I said. “Maybe I can put a sign out front that says, ‘ATTENTION ALL GIRLS: FREE HELP HERE.’” “‘ATTENTION ALL HOT GIRLS,’” he corrected, straightening up. “Right,” I said, trying not to roll my eyes. “That’s an important distinction.” He pointed at me with the pool stick. “Speaking of hot, I like that uniform.” This time, I did roll my eyes." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Arthur Brisbane
item.description: "A good friend can tell you what is the matter with you in a minute. He may not seem such a good friend after telling. " -- Arthur Brisbane

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "Under normal circumstances, you inviting me to the bedroom would be the highlight of my day." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Ali Bin Abi Thalib
item.description: "He who has a thousand friends has not a friend to spare, And he who has one enemy will meet him everywhere. " -- Ali Bin Abi Thalib

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Richelle Mead
P e t t y add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "Of course they didn't give us this much, Sage. But I had to make sure I nailed my first assignment. Takes a lot of tries before you hit perfection." He paused to reconsider that. "Well, except for my parents. They got it on the first try." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Ambrose Bierce
item.description: "Bore, n.: A person who talks when you wish him to listen." -- Ambrose Bierce

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "Why on earth would you buy a car like this if you can't drive a stick? There are dozens of cars--new cars--that have automatic transmission. It'd be a million times easier." Adrian shrugged. "I like the color. It matches my living room." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Andre Gide
item.description: "It is better to be hated for what you are than to be loved for what you are not." -- Andre Gide

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "There are no good girls gone wrong - just bad girls found out." -- Mae West

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Conversation should be pleasant without scurrility, witty without affectation, free without indecency, learned without conceitedness, novel without falsehood." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Laurel Thatcher Ulrich
item.description: "Well-behaved women seldom make history." -- Laurel Thatcher Ulrich

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "I must be cruel only to be kind; Thus bad begins, and worse remains behind." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "For most of history, Anonymous was a woman." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by william shakespeare
item.description: "I wasted time, and now doth time waste me; For now hath time made me his numbering clock: My thoughts are minutes; and with sighs they jar Their watches on unto mine eyes, the outward watch, Whereto my finger, like a dial's point, Is pointing still, in cleansing them from tears. Now sir, the sound that tells what hour it is Are clamorous groans, which strike upon my heart, Which is the bell: so sighs and tears and groans Show minutes, times, and hours." -- william shakespeare

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "In time we hate that which we often fear." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Virginia Woolf
item.description: "Lock up your libraries if you like; but there is no gate, no lock, no bolt that you can set upon the freedom of my mind." -- Virginia Woolf

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "All human actions have one or more of these seven causes: chance, nature, compulsion, habit, reason, passion, and desire." -- Aristotle

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by John Lennon
item.description: "As usual, there is a great woman behind every idiot." -- John Lennon

item.title: P e t t y add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work." -- Aristotle
